General.Name: Strike Energy Limited
General.Description: Strike Energy Limited explores for and develops oil and gas resources in Australia. The company primarily focuses on the Project Haber, Ocean Hill, Perth Basin Geothermal, Walyering, West, and South Erregulla projects located in the Perth Basin. Strike Energy Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is based in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 66 Kings Park Road, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
